snippet.title: Ari Buktu and the Anytime Elevator | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2184020?utm_source=announcement_trailer

Ari Buktu and the Anytime Elevator is a vibrant and thrilling story-rich 2.5D puzzle-platformer inspired by 80s adventures. Join the eccentric professor and his unwitting student on a time travel treasure hunt through history. A cinematic journey where you'll never know WHEN you’ll go next.
